title: FIeldCalibration
description: This describes the procedure used to measure the field dependent variations in the pixel-to-pixel sensitivity of the detector and/or by distortions in the optical path.

subCategoriesOrder.FIeldCalibration: This describes the procedure used to measure the field dependent variations in the pixel-to-pixel sensitivity of the detector and/or by distortions in the optical path.
